DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , prospective randomize control trial evaluate safety efficacy YAG vitreolysis versus sham symptomatic Weiss ring due posterior vitreous detachment .
DOC.detailed_description: 52 subject enrol trial randomize 2:1 ratio receive either YAG laser vitreolysis sham laser symptomatic Weiss ring due posterior vitreous detachment . Subjects follow one week , one month , three month , six month procedure . Assessments include questionnaire regard duration floater symptom prior presentation , severity floater symptom , number floater , activity inconvenience presence floater ; Medical , ocular history demographic collect ; ETDRS Snellen visual acuity ; Optos color photography ; Heidelberg Spectralis Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT ) infrared photo ; B scan ultrasound Weiss ring caliper measurement near distance Weiss ring retina , Weiss ring posterior lens capsule ( phakic eye ) ; Slit lamp indirect ophthalmoscopy scleral depression study eye ; Applanation tonometry ; Visual Functioning Questionnaire-25 ( VFQ 25 ) . Qualitative change Optos photography evaluate masked physician .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Symptoms floater correlate presence posterior vitreous detachment least 6 month 2 . Documented posterior vitreous detachment clinical examination , OCT , B scan 3 . Selfrating visual disturbance floater must least 4 010 scale , 0 symptom 10 debilitate symptom . 4 . Symptomatic Weiss ring ( PVD ) must least 3 mm away retina 5 mm posterior lens capsule crystalline lens , measure Bscan . For pseudophakic patient , minimum required distance intraocular lens . 5 . Able position YAG laser procedure . 6 . Accept risk YAG laser include limited retinal detachment , intraocular hemorrhage , retinal damage , cataract formation , optic nerve damage , inflammation , irreversible loss vision . 7 . Willing able comply clinic visit studyrelated procedure 8 . If patient two symptomatic eye , one eye randomize include study . 9 . Provide sign informed consent 1 .
